title: WhatsAppâ€™s iOS-exclusive blur tool could soon roll out for Android users
content:
WhatsApp is notorious for its slow development when compared to some of its rivals. It takes the company a long time to come up with new features, and typically they lack originality. That’s surprising because the Meta-owned instant messaging (IM) app has unlimited resources — relatively speaking. There are no monetary constraints limiting this platform

The post WhatsApp’s iOS-exclusive blur tool could soon roll out for Android users appeared first on xda-developers.
description: WhatsApp's blur tool has been available on iOS for a long time. The company is finally working on bringing it to its Android app.
